ai-robot-brain/ai-prompts/chapter_3_begi.description: Use these prompts with AI assistants (like Claude, ChatGPT, or your embedded RAG chatbot) to get help understanding perception, SLAM, and navigation concepts.

ai-robot-brain/ai-prompts/chapter_3_inte.description: Use these prompts with AI assistants to get help implementing perception nodes, configuring SLAM, managing TF2, and deploying Nav2.

digital-twin/chapter_2_introduction.title: Introduction: Digital Twin & Simulation
digital-twin/chapter_2_introduction.description: From ROS 2 commands to virtual robots: Building the simulation layer for safe, rapid, and scalable robot development.

digital-twin/chapter_2_overview.title: Chapter 2: Digital Twin & Simulation
digital-twin/chapter_2_overview.description: Create a virtual robot replica that mirrors and controls your physical humanoid.

workflow-orchestration/chapter_4_introdu.title: Introduction: Workflow Orchestration
workflow-orchestration/chapter_4_introdu.description: This chapter introduces the concept of multi-component robotic workflows with state machines, pipeline orchestration, and recovery mechanisms in ROS 2. Students will learn how robots can combine multiple processes into one continuous workflow, handle complex tasks, monitor ongoing processes, detect issues, and make adjustments in real-time without human micromanagement.

workflow-orchestration/intermediate/exer.title: Intermediate Tier Exercises
workflow-orchestration/intermediate/exer.description: This document consolidates all exercises from the Intermediate tier lessons for hands-on practice with ROS 2 workflow implementation.
